org.fruit.alayer

Class AutomationCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fruit.alayer.AutomationCache

  • public abstract class AutomationCache
extends java.lang.Object
    SUT UI soft automation caching. Provides capability to Delay release of cached UI automation elements.
